net.sf.mmm.service.api

Interface RemoteInvocationCall

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RemoteInvocationCommand<RESULT>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCall

    public interface RemoteInvocationCall
extends Serializable
    This is the marker interface for a single remote invocation. For RPC style it is a method invocation of a RemoteInvocationService. For command style it is the RemoteInvocationCommand.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
